title: Anna University Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Project Research Scientist Posts
description: Anna University has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech in Pharmaceutical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the Anna University Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
